text: Ask the StoryBots is an American live-action/animated television series for children. The series was based on the characters from the StoryBots educational website and videos. It was first streamed on Netflix on August 12, 2016. The series created by JibJab Bros. Studios. The StoryBots media franchise was bought by Netflix in May 2019. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * the StoryBots on Netflix Category:Netflix original series Category:Annie Award winners Category:2010s American children's television series Category:2010s American animated television series Category:2016 American television series debuts Category:2019 American television series endings
title: Ask the StoryBots
